item.title: Hello Youtube
item.description: This is link to download hugo : https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases/download/v0.71.0/hugo_0.71.0_Windows-64bit.zip To install Hugo on Windows 1st step : Download hugo from the link that I suggested. 2rd step : Extract to the place you wished for example (D:hugo/bin) 3nd step : Go to enviroment variable and set the part of the hugo for example (D:/hugo/bin) 4nd step : Check is the hugo installed by go to cmd and type(C:>hugo version)
